title: Can't Move or fight back, with no lag
body: Randomly, throughout my games today my champ will freeze in place, and I wont be able to use abilities, move, use items, or summoners.  My champ will auto attack enemies around him but I cant select the target.  I have 40 ping, with a very strong wired connection.  Everyone else moves in real time, and I watch myself die.  I can move my camera around the map, see chat from team mates, and  chat myself.  This needs to be fixed.  My hardware and connection are 100% effective, and I know its not an issue on my end.

replies.body:
[Please head on over to this thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/3njvd7AN-glitch-cant-move-no-lag), and follow the instructions. 

I'll see if someone has a fix yet.
